name: Multi Maze
description:
Multi Maze is a multiplayer game in which two players battle each other in a maze. However, each player only has one bullet.

How to play
  • Move with WASD & arrow keys
  • Shoot with left & right shift
  • Rebind keys in the Controls menu
Background

I was working on a grand strategy game for this month, but it isn't finished yet. As the saying goes: much good work is lost for the lack of little more. I'm going to give it the time that it deserves; hopefully I can finish it for next month's release.

The music used in this game was made by Marching Dream.

Total development time: 14 hours
